sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Astrology proved harmless, useful, pious. Being a sermon / written by Richard Carpenter. Carpenter, Richard, d. 1670?
[10], 40 p.
Printed by Ja: Cottrel, for John Allen at the Rising Sun, and Joseph Barber at the Lamb in Paul's Church-yard., London : 1657.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "January 1st"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "6". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
